mdRecord.dcterms:title: "The Origins of Finger-Print Identification"; 01 of 06
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 91-93; "The Origins of Finger-Print Identification"; Handwritten notes regarding the origin of using fingerprints for identification. Possibly the manuscript of Henry Faulds for one of his published pamphlets of virtually the same title.; 6 leaves; DF 871
